description: Analyze text, HTML, or a public webpage.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username used to authenticate with the service. Username and password credentials are only required to run your application locally or outside of Bluemix. When running on Bluemix, the credentials will be automatically loaded from the `VCAP_SERVICES` environment variable.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password used to authenticate with the service. Username and password credentials are only required to run your application locally or outside of Bluemix. When running on Bluemix, the credentials will be automatically loaded from the `VCAP_SERVICES` environment variable.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Release date of the API version in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: features
parameters.description: Specific features to analyze the document for.

parameters.name: clean
parameters.description: Remove website elements, such as links, ads, etc.

parameters.name: xpath
parameters.description: XPath query for targeting nodes in HTML.

parameters.name: fallback_to_raw
parameters.description: Whether to use raw HTML content if text cleaning fails.

parameters.name: return_analyzed_text
parameters.description: Whether or not to return the analyzed text.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: ISO 639-1 code indicating the language to use in the analysis.

parameters.name: limit_text_characters
parameters.description: Sets the maximum number of characters that are processed by the service.
